page.title: 04LAW AND ORDER AND SERVICES
page.content: {Knighton Police}are part of the{Dyfed {Powys Delta Division.}The police station has one cell,an office, an interview room but no computer.It is manned by a sergeant and five constables who cover about a ten mile radius.Information can be obtained from Carmarthen by radio telephone. {Knighton Fire Station}is a retained station with nine firemen and a sub-officer in charge.Firemen are called by battery operated alerters and within two minutes of being alerted six firemen and a sub-officer are mobile. The station has {two {appliances,a water ladder and a Land {Rover.} {The Powys Area Health Authority}has three ambulances based at the local hospital which are on twenty four hour standby to take patients to other hospitals and clinics for treatment.
